description.en: All NGOs, including INGOs, are required since 2009 to be registered here to be allowed to operate (Act 16, 2009). Registration needs to be renewed every 5 years. The year of registration/renewal is part of the ID but should be omitted.

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: NGOs and INGOs should be able to provide this number on request. Remove slashes and the year of registration/renewal (last four digits)
